member.name: T:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.CellsOrCandidatesInitializerAnalyzer
member.summary:
Indicates an analyzer that analyzes the code for the following diagnostic results:
SD0305 The input value in this initializer is invalid
SD0306F The remove expression in the initializer following with the current constructor has no effect
SD0307 The expression can be simplified
SD0308F The initializer contains the duplicate value

member.name: T:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.CellsOrCandidatesInitializerAnalyzer.CodeAnalyzer
member.summary: Defines the syntax receiver.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.CellsOrCandidatesInitializerAnalyzer.CodeAnalyzer.#ctor(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Initializes a instance via the specified cancellation token.
member.param: The cancellation token to cancel the operation.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.CellsOrCandidatesInitializerAnalyzer.SD0305
member.summary: Indicates the SD0305 diagnostic result (The input value in this initializer is invalid).

member.name: F:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.CellsOrCandidatesInitializerAnalyzer.SD0306
member.summary: Indicates the SD0306 diagnostic result (The remove expression in the initializer following with the current constructor has no effect).

member.name: F:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.CellsOrCandidatesInitializerAnalyzer.SD0307
member.summary: Indicates the SD0307 diagnostic result (The expression can be simplified).

member.name: F:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.CellsOrCandidatesInitializerAnalyzer.SD0308
member.summary: Indicates the SD0308 diagnostic result (The initializer contains the duplicate value).
